front.div:
Many modern programming languages contain a special interface called reflection. Reflection can be used
to programmatically read, modifying, and create code in a particular language. Because the main purpose
of XSLT is to transform XML documents, and because a XSLT stylesheet is expressed in the XML
syntax, we can use XSLT to manipulate stylesheets themselves. In the following article I'm going to show
you how useful XSLT reflection can be.
